publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2022 Cathy Peattie: The Public Transport Users’ Committee for Scotland Amendment Order 2008—That the Transport, Infrastructure and Climate Change Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Public Transport Users’ Committee for Scotland Amendment Order 2008 (SSI 2008/186).
